compatibility.notes: ODbL-1.0 allows for compatibility with permissive licenses but is incompatible with strong copyleft licenses like GPL. Care should be taken when combining with licenses that have similar requirements.

key_requirements: Maintain the same freedoms for others when sharing or modifying the database.
Clarify rights governing the contents of the database if they are covered by different licenses.
license.name: ODbL-1.0
obligations: You must attribute the original source of the database.
You must share any derivative databases under the same license.
You must provide a copy of the ODbL license when distributing the database.
